zh: 各產業分類指數之成分股則為符合掛牌時間且屬於該產業之上櫃公司普通股，上櫃公司所屬之產業類別係依「上櫃公司產業類別劃分暨調整要點」定義。
紡織纖維類、電機機械類、化學工業類、建材營造類、航運類
生技醫療類、半導體業、電腦及週邊設備業、光電業、通信網路業、電子零組件業、電子通路業、資訊服務業
綠能環保類、數位雲端類、居家生活類
電子工業類、鋼鐵工業類、紡織纖維類、電機機械類、化學工業類、建材營造類、航運類、觀光餐旅類、生技醫療類、半導體業、電腦及週邊設備業、光電業、通信網路業、電子零組件業、電子通路業、資訊服務業、文化創意業
各該產業當日收市之發行量加權股價指數值
綠能環保類、數位雲端類、居家生活類
「金融保險業指數」、「證券業指數」、「未含金融股發行量加權股價指數」及「電器電纜類指數」

en: The TPEx follows the industry definitions under the Taipei Exchange Directions for Classifying and Adjusting the Industry Categories of TPEx Listed Companies. The constituents in the Industrial Sub-Indices are common stocks of TPEx listed companies that meet the listing time requirement and belong to respective sectors.
Textiles, Electric Machinery, Chemical, Building Materials and Construction, Shipping and Transportation

Biotechnology and Medical Care, Semiconductors, Computer and Peripheral Equipment, Optoelectronics, Communications and Internet, Electronic Parts/Components, Electronic Products Distribution,  Information Service
Green Energy and Environmental Services, Digital and Cloud Services, Household

Iron and Steel, Textiles, Electric Machinery, Chemical, Building Materials and Construction, Shipping and Transportation, Tourism and Hospitality, Biotechnology and Medical Care, Semiconductors, Computer and Peripheral Equipment, Optoelectronics, Communications and Internet, Electronic Parts/Components, Electronic Products Distribution,  Information Service, Cultural and Creative
The base values are identical to the respective closing price indices on that day.
